reviews.review: While notably less inventive and with weaker core gameplay than its older brother, Bioshock Infiinite tries to make up for it with a crazy, ridiculous, over-the-top storyline and a companion AI character. It's still a lot of fun and there is quite a bit of explanation given about the original game, even if it can't live up to Bioshock's incredible reviews.

Tout fan de FPS se devrait d'avoir joué à BioShock Infinite, tout y est excelent, les graphismes comme le scénario ( qui réserve une fin assez "innatendue" ). Le jeu plutôt simple en Difficile mais le mode "1999" vous apprendra l'humilité. A jouer sans modération !!!

เนื้อเรื่องที่น่าติดตาม ฉากระทึกขวัญและสนุกประทับใจ สมกับเป็น Game of the year 2014!
เกมเพลของตระกูล Bioshock คือเดินยิง แต่แฝงไปด้วยความน่ากลัว ในภาคนี้จะกลับกัน คุณไม่จำเป็นต้องอยู่ในที่แคบมืดอีกต่อไป เพราะคุณจะได้วิ่งอยู่ในเมืองอันกว้างใหญ่และสวยงาม ที่แฝงไปด้วยอันตราย และความลับที่ซ่อนเร้นรอให้คุณไปค้นหา

คุณจะมี NPC ผู้ช่วยในช่วงกลางเกม แต่ไม่ได้หมายความว่าตัวเกมจะง่ายขึ้น กลับกันมันจะเพิ่มความซับซ้อนในการจัดการสถานการณ์ที่อยู่ตรงหน้า แทนที่คุณจะหลบกลังกล่อง คุณอาจให้ NPC เปิดฉากลับเพื่อที่คุณจะได้ใช้ประโยชน์จากมันเข้าโจมตีศัตรูของคุณ เป็นต้น

ด้านเนื้อเรื่องเสริม ก็เป็นอะไรที่น่าสนใจ แต่ว่าข้อเสียของเกมตระกูลนี้คือเมื่อผู้เล่นรู้ทุกอย่าง ก็ไม่มีความอยากจะย้อนกลับมาเล่นซ้ำอีกครั้ง ซึ่งถือเป็นข้อเสียของเกมอย่างยิ่งยวด

แม้ว่าคุณอยาจจะรู้เนื้อเรื่องมาบ้าง แต่ถ้ายังไม่ได้เล่น ขอแนะนำให้เล่นซะ แล้วคุณจะพบกับศิลปะที่ผู้สร้างเกมนำเสนอให้แก่คุณ ซึ่งมันมีค่ามากพอที่คุณจะเสียเวลาเดินเตรดเตร่ในเมืองเพื่อชมวิวทิวทัศน์ หรือฟังดนตรีประกอบฉากในบางจุด ทั้งๆ ที่มันไม่มีส่วนเกี่ยวข้องกับการดำเนินเนื้อเรื่องเลยก็ตาม
Одна из лучших игр этого поколения. Обязательна для прохождения как геймерам, так и их друзьям, нелюбящим игры.

Bioshock infinite is one of the few games that can be called a masterpiece, the settings, story and characters are all perfectly done and you will be asking yourself the how's and why's long after the game is finished. Gameplay is fun with cool things like vigors and skylines, as well as interesting enemies like handymen and motorised patriots. The DLC's tie in Bioshock and Bioshock Infinite nicely, bringing a well rounded game and series to a close.

Take into account me playing trough it multiple times on my peasant machine. The only thing I have not played is Burial at Sea Part 2, because lack of time. I have done some writing, not enough to call myself a writer though. But this game has the writing I have ever seen, despite what my colleges say about it. This game is first and foremost the best game I have ever played.

Buy this game. Bioshock Infinite is no doubt the best game of 2013, if not the entire decade. The gameplay is very fun, the atmosphere is brilliantly constructed (and beautiful in places) and the story is nothing short of mind-blowing. Play it or regret it. One of the few games on Steam worth paying full price for, and quite frankly you're wasting your money if you're buying anything else and you don't already own this.
10/10 (This is to gaming what Breaking Bad is to TV)

Also play the DLC, the second part is better than the first, but they're both excellent additions to an incredible franchise.

To make it sweet and short this game changes how you normally would see a typical Bioshock game. It looks a whole lot more different than the original with a beautiful new setting, new weapons, new enemies, and a brand new story with some interesting lore behind it.
Amazing game, beautiful scenery and great story line.

When this was coming out, everyone was calling it Game of the Year, that is, until The Last of Us came out, an then GTA V came out. While I didn't play any of these two, I can definietely say that Bioshock Infinite deserves to be called Game of the Year.

Many FPS games today are basically multiplayer with little to no single player campaign. This is not the case. This is a big, well-made singleplayer adventure set in the floating city of Columbia , in the year 1912. The story is told in a good way with all the cutscenes done in-game.

Graphically, the game is stunning, the environment are beautiful and sometimes artistic and the lighting effects are amazing. The characters have a rather semi-realistic look, nut that doesn't mean the game is not serious. This is what this genre lacks in general: COLORS. It's really nice to see a living, more colorful areas instead of gray or brown. The animations were smooth and nice too.

I really liked the music and all those radios etc. playing in the city. It really makes you feel like you're the part of the world. I really liked the voice acting as well. 

When it comes to gameplay... I loved it, and I'm not a great fan of first person shooters. You get to use a range of different weapons as well as several powers to use against your enemies. The combat is solid and works well. Aside from weapons and powers you can also use melee attacks with a Sky-Hook that also allows you to cling onto freight hooks and go along rails in the air which is awesome. There're other things to do aside from just going to your goal and killing those who oppose you. All throught the world you'll find audio files of different characters, which add some detail to the story, as well as small old-school videos and telescope to look into. Even upgrades for health, salts and shield are often well-hidden, so the game really wants you to explore more, instead of just going from point A to point B. 

The game took 11 hours to beat for me and I have found majority of collectibles, I still had some left. The game still was a little short in my standards. It was still REALLY worth it, especially for the price since I loved every second of it. I loved the presentation, I loved the gameplay, the powers, the characters. It is clearly a game where developers put EFFORT into it.

I'll probably get the DLC and the previous games in the series because I just want more.

Fun, exciting, and exhilirating! It's action packed from the moment you press play 'till the end! It's got a great storyline, cool in-game features, cool easter eggs, and best of all, cool gameplay! I would recommend buying it if you had the chance!
I didn't like it - it's the only FPS that made me dizzy time after time. The combat is mediocre if you look past the pretty imagery.

I have mixed feelings about this game...  I wish there were more nuanced options beyond thumbs up/down.  

The game is fantastic in almost every way, but it is short.  I feel cheated paying $80 for 10 hours of gameplay.  Replay value?  ZERO.  ZERO REPLAY VALUE.

Here laid bare is the terrible lie of episodic gameplay.  Its not cheaper, and not faster to develop.  We just get less for our money.

After finishing this game, I looked down at hands, knowing I will never be the same.
Tenoutaten!

Los Bioshock han sido todos excelente FPSs y el tercero, incluyendo los 2 eps de DLC, no son la excepción. El gameplay de disparos + poderes garantiza la diversión, aparte el nuevo combate vertical de las vías aereas y los poderes de Elizabeth(tu compañera durante el juego) estan re copados. La inmersión en el mundo también se destaca, Columbia es tan o mas fascinante que Rapture y los excelentes gráficos ayudan pila a lograr esto. El único tema es la historia, que por mas que se cree a si misma la gran cosa, ni bien te pones a pensar un cacho; no lo es ni a palos. El final no tiene sentido, ni siquiera con las propias "reglas" del juego, pero bueno no tiene por que tener sentido para ser entretenido ;) En todo caso definitivamente recomendable el juego, no solo el juego pero también su DLS. Los 2 episodios de Buried at Sea están geniales, aunque el segundo se nota que no le pusieron tantas ganas. En fin un juegazo que todo fan debería jugar.

25 марта 2013 года,Именно тогда я взял управление над героем Букер Девитт,которые повели его на поиски девушки Элизабет,оказалась дочерью главного Героя.  Девятнадцатилетняя девушка, обладающая сверхъестественными способностями. Заключена в башню Агнец в Колумбии. Охраняется крылатой машиной по прозвищу Соловей.Bioshock Infinite концовка оставила больше вопросов не лежи ответов!Ken Levine пообещал раскрыть часть всех секретов в первом DLC Burial at Sea.В первом  DLC Элизабет  представила из себя нечто вроде Лютесов,в конце BioShock Infinite произошло некое собрание Элизабет со всех миров.Благодаря такому состоянию она способна видеть бесконечное разнообразие со всех миром,Ken Levine предоставил нам элигантную фразу  в виде  способность видеть двери и то что за ними.За ними она видит то что Комсток он же Букер Девитт,которому удалось сбежать от нее и избежать наказаниев другом мире и попадает в rapture.Но продолжу историю DLC Burial at Sea где Элизабет нанимает Букера,что бы найти пропавшую девочку Салли..Этим же заманить его на смерть,где Букер умрет от руки большого Папочки.И теперь мне стало ясно что все Комстоки погибли во всех мирам.Во втором DLC Burial at Sea где все Элизабет слипаются в одну где она становится обычной девушкой.Это дорога смерти Элизабет "Туз в рукаве",тут  отвлеку ваше внимание и вспомню Bioshock тот самый в котором все начиналось...имя главного героя Джек,он же сын Эндрю Райана главный враг Атласа он же "Фрэнк Фонтейн"!Фонтейн был убит Джеком,тем самым спас 5 девочек вырастив их как дочерей вот все что  нужно знать о первой части Bioshock...Туз в рукаве то что хотел узнать Атлас во втором  DLC Burial at Sea.Скажу о Элизабет со сверхъестественными способностями она знала о Джеке,знала что он спасет Салли и других девочек , знала что Атлас убьет её. Не смотря на все она шла до конца,она хотела прервать круг жестокости..в которой она сыграла не малую роль....Погибла ли Элизабет на всегда,скорее всего ДА!Буду только думать о том что в другом Мире Дочь Букера "Анна" не станет Элизабет,и он не продаст ее в карты,и Они будут отличной семьей!! Спасибо Irrational Games спасибо Ken Levine,какой бы не была концовка  весь путь был к ней очень интересен,и время потраченое на BioShock стоило того!Спасибо............

This was a hell of a ride. Much like its predecessors, the settings themselves were characters in and of themselves, and provided an epic canvas for the unfolding story. I regret not picking this one up on release day, but I am glad that I waited until the two episodes of DLC were available. There is quite a lot of wrapping up of loose ends, especially in episode two. Though the campaign was short, I felt that I definitely got my money's worth out of this package from steam, at around 40 for the game and another 20 for the DLC. On a scale of one to ten, i would give it a BUY THIS GAME.

Великолепная игра, одна из лучших за все время игропрома. Irrational games сумели собрать все лучшее, что было в первой части, при этом улучшив шутерную механику до нормального уровня. Но не механика здесь главное. Это все таки в первую очередь великолепный, бесподобный сюжет, который прописан до мелочей, приправленный хорошей графикой. Сюжетная составляющая и персонажи написаны лучше, чем в некоторых фильмах.Это действительно великая игра (имхо), возможно лучшая сюжетная игра за все время. Поиграть в нее стоит каждому. Также хочется отметить два сюжетных дополения, Burial at Sea Ep.1 и Ep.2, связывающих первую часть 2007-года и Infinite. Они не уступают по сюжету оригинальной игре, + переносят действие в Восторг, написанный заново на новом движке, и выглядящий восхитительно. В общем игра определенно стоит того, чтобы в нее поиграть, и уж точно стоит своих денег. 10/10!

Das Hauptspiel habe ich 4mal durch. 
Absolutes Meisterwerk.
Ständig bin ich stehengeblieben, habe mir Plakate, Schriften durchgelesen, Voxophone gesammelt.
Screenshoots gemacht, ohne Ende, mit Gänsehaut vorm Rechner gesessen, da vieles so immersiv war.
Sound, Musik, Voiceacting alles auf Triple A Niveau. 
Schonungslos behandelt das Spiel die Zeit der Rassenteilung, des Rassismus, strenge Gläubigkeit ist an der Tagesordnung.
Aber am besten sind die Sky Lines, damit hatte ich besonders viel Spaß


Allerdings habe ich das Ende des Hauptspiels erst durch das DLC verstanden. 


Das DLC ist ein absolutes Must Have

Bestehend aus 2 Episoden, der Spieler wird zurück nach Rapture geschickt, in der Rolle als Booker, dort trifft man dann auf eine neu designte Elisabeth, weltklasse.

In der zweiten Episode spielt man als Elisabeth und man trifft auf viele altbekannte Gesichter, die Episode war so gut das sie ohne Probleme mit dem Hauptspiel mithalten kann, ich war sehr oft geflashed, buff, es gab sehr viele Gänsehaut Momente, man erfährt viele neue kleine Details, z.B über Songbird, die Handyman usw.
Es war überragend. 10/10

Daraus hätte man ein eigenes Spiel machen können.

When I played Bioshock, spurred on by it's gushing reviews, I found myself disappointed. There was so much good about the game but it was lacking in something. While the environments were brilliant, some of the characters marvellous, and a it included a clever albeit pretty much meaningless twist, it didn't stay with me in any meaningful way. Not so with Bioshock Infinite. This game will stay with me, I will go over the story and the themes and the ideas countless times I am sure. I imagine when I play through it a second time I will understand much more All of it delivered it a wonderfully designed and beautiful package. It is the best game I have played in a very very long time.

Как отдельный продукт игра очень хороша,но я воспринимаю ее через призму двух первых частей и скажу,что разработчиками не был сделан какой-то сногсшибательный прорыв. Да поменяли географию места и то,признаком этой замены стало появление аэротрассы и все.. Графика поменялась,ну само собой,2013 год на дворе. Сюжет....сюжет в целом слабоват,каких-то поворотов на которые бы я сказал "Вау" я не помню. После игры осталось ощущение ,что я разворачивал огромную новогоднюю конфету в яркой блестящей упаковке,которая громко шуршит,мнется и тем самым еще больше вызывает стремление раскрыть ее побыстрее,а внутри оказывается достаточно дешевый леденец,который авиакомпании выдают при взлете,немного грустно. Могу порекомендовать фанатам серии или пилотам дерижаблей.

I don't normally like FPS games - I'm an adventure game girl. But this one was pretty good as far as game play is concerned and it didn't make me nauseous (a frequent problem for me with FPS). More importantly, I loved the story and the game is just plain beautiful. I'm already on my second play through.

If you dont own this game... please buy it. I generally do not play FPS games but i have played every single BioShock and this game had me engrossed from start to finish. It makes you WANT to search for items and upgrades. the basic game is about 30 hours of insane gameplay.  The season pass And DLC will make you quite literally pee your pants. You must buy this game. If you dont you are missing out on an INSANE game that will change your perspective on FPS games. Enjoy!

I have only played around 7 hours of Bioshock Infinite at this point and not yet completed it, so keep that in mind when reading my review. 

First of all I will say that the game is really well drawn and looks beautiful! The soundtrack and the voices are excellent as well and you really feel like you get immersed into the Bioshock world (Columbia). It's also quite exciting and the story is captivating and makes you want to explore it further to discover what is going on. I like the shooting and combat which is pretty classic first-person shooter. Some parts of the gameplay reminds me slightly of Borderlands but of course Bioshock is a completely different animal. 

Unfortunately there are also some not so great things about it, mainly being that it's very linear and won't allow you to deviate much from the path that needs to be followed to move the story along. In fact it restricts you way too much in my opinion and you will find many many doors that are locked and can't be opened and places that can't be accessed. One example is when you are on a beach at one point and there are people playing in the water. If you try to run out in the water you will be blocked as if there was a wall of glass in front of you. I don't need it to be a sandbox game, but I definitely would have enjoyed it better if the developer had allowed me to roam a bit more freely and investigate the game world more freely. 
Another thing I don't like much is that many of the characters in the game look exactly the same. It would have been nice if everyone looked different, maybe apart from an acutal twin now and then, instead of using generic characters in so many places (NPCs). Likewise you cannot engage with the majority of the characters in the game. You can step up next to them and listen to what they talk about which is a really nice touch which adds lots of ambiance to the game, but you cannot talk to them or interact with them for the most part. I would have liked to be able to do that to some degree. 

All in all I will definitely recommend the game because it is actually really good entertainment and it's definitely one of the best looking games I have played. 

Hope this review helped and if I change my mind after finishing the game I will update the review accordingly :-)

Have fun!

Best Single player game I played last year with great game play and story. 10/10

PLease note that I'm 12 hours in and purchased for 9.99 during a Steam sale.

I think people have become far too nit-picky about this game. As a 60 dollar purchase maybe I'd read the critiques and given them some thought, but at 10 dollars I can't find a way to see this game as anything less than amazing. 

Somewhere I read a review that complained how un-interactive the NPCs are (no dialogue trees, etc.) - I didn't expect this game to function like Skyrim, because Skyrim is a role-playing game. This is an artistic and aesthetically pleasing first-person shooter with an interesting enough story to keep you engaged and really gorgeous graphics.

I also have read references to people hating the ending. Haven't gotten there yet. If I end up hating it, so what? The game is a delight to play. 

I'll update this after I finish the game.

Update: The game was great. The ending was interesting, although I wouldn't say that the ending improved the game (or hurt it even). Made me think, and probably will replay at least some of it to re-assess some of the sequences. It was fun to play! Also, I didn't ever give much thought to the clothing upgrade system. I may try to pay more attention to this in the replay but it didn't seem to change my gameplay or the success of my approaches.

I really don't think this game is as good as people think it is.  Its not a good shooter first and foremost.  The enemies know you are there as soon as you step into the levels.  There is no avoiding, there is no sneaking.  There is just this pervasive blast everything you see.  Its just not good.  The aiming and hit detection are pretty horrible too.  I liked Bioshock and I played it for the first time a week before this game came out.  This game is just NOT worth it.

Great game. This was one of the games that actually made me sad that it was over and I haven't played one of those in a long long long time. Gameplay's great, graphics are beautiful, storyline is amazing, and character development is out of this world, some critisism though, I really wish Elizabeth was able to further her tearing abilties than just med packs and ammo, She helps out a bunch but it would of been really cool if she could conjour up cooler stuff. Not saying motorized patriots or machine gun turrents aren't cool but you know what I mean. Also I really wish there was better replay value, or have it like Bioshock 1 and 2 and have different endings so you can go back and play the game to get the different ending. Anyway this was easily a 10/10 in my book if you are thinking about buying it, go right on ahead it's worth it!!!!!
Magnifique !!!!

kesinlikle alınıp oynanması gerekiyor. episode'larıda alın oynayın mutlaka. oynayın doğru mu bilmem ama izleyin ve oynayın demek daha doğru galiba. hikayesini de oynarken derinlemesine işleyin içinize. adamın dibisin ken levine 10/10

Игра великолепна, но для любителей ачивок...пройти придется не один раз) Наслаждайтесь!
Love it <3 :D
Its Bioshock why not?

Oh man, have this game surprised me! Having played the first two installments of this franchise I was finding Bioshock Infinite a little boring for the first few hours. I kept thinking that the first game could not really be beaten in terms of story. Boy, was I [gladly] wrong. I can't say anything without giving out major spoilers, but let's just say this is possibly the best sci-fi story involving parallel worlds that I have ever saw. I wish this story was written as a book so I could have it on my bookshelf. So many - deep and well written - philosophical concepts within a single game.

Best game I have ever played.  The graphics are really nice and the way the AI act, especially Elizabeth, is brilliant and she even shows emotion and reacts to how you play.  I would definately recommend this to anyone as it is a great game, even as a standalone (I haven't played any other BioShocks and I haven't needed to to understand this game).  The second time you play it is great as you notice a lot of things you missed the first time round.  Definately a game I would play through again.
супер игра! сюжет пиз....ый

Шикарная игра! Сюжет, персонажи и концовка на высоте. 
Минусов для себя не нашел, хотя поначалу казалось, что некоторые моменты затянуты. Но потом все становится на свои места.
Наверное это первая, после Мафии, игра, в которой я просидел разглядывая титры, слушая финальную музыку (к слову, музыкальное оформление игры - это еще один огромный плюс) размышляя и "переваривая" все события последних минут 15 игры. 
Очень аккуратно и красиво подвели связь между приквелом и собственно основным "подводным" Биошоком.
Элизабет - лучший напарник за все игры, что я играл. Она действительно помогает, а не тяготит или отбирает время и силы.
Ну и пост-титровая сцена - это как вишенка на вершине отличного торта.

Браво! 10 из 10 и титул одной из лучших игр своего жанра в истории.
Amazing game start to finish! Great Story . if you like bioshock 1 or 2 you"ll love this one

phenomenal gameplay, beautiful graphics, amazing story, overall fabulous game. i would definitely recommend this to anyone and everyone. i was unable to play Bioshock 1 and 2 due to absolute terror, but have watched others play, so this was a really great experience and an absolute joy to play.
